Odeinoichus,"2016-07-07T17:37:36.21Z","Time to Scout the Arctic.","

Set #30310 Arctic Scout: The new Arctic Sub-Theme includes some pretty impressive builds, and if you’re undecided on some of the more expensive sets this polybag includes a solid mini build that introduces this sub-theme quite nicely. I really dig it and here’s why.

column2: Awesome looking mini prop glider vehicle with way more pieces than the Repair Lift.
Arctic Scout minifigure features double-sided torso print, and leg printing, not often found in polybags. Great helmet and dark blue hands as well.
Completed model includes printed arctic team print on a sloped piece and is a solid looking build that is fun to play with.
Model is back heavy, will tip over backwards when sitting on the skis, they move too easily/loosely making it difficult to sit stably without the pilot in the control seat.
Too few orange pieces, would prefer a few more orange coloured pieces to fit in with the arctic sub-theme vehicles than what is provided.
No accessories for the minifigure, no skis, no ice axes, nothing. Most unfortunate.

column1: Overall good solid offering here and a great introduction to the Arctic Sub-Theme, definitely recommend tracking this one down for your City collection and polybag fans are going to love that you get a printed piece and double-sided torso and leg printing which is not often found in polybags. Buy multiples for parts and just because this is a seriously awesome little build.
